Entries.spring_2.001: Well yeah, the urge is still there, but the meds seem to be doing their job...$3
Entries.marriage_Fri.000: Oh hey, bud. You're looking busy today. Don't overwork yourself, all right?$6
Entries.winter_15.000: I'd sneak Jas in to see the mermaid show if I didn't think Marnie would find out somehow.$6
Entries.winter_18.000: Jas really likes going to the clinic for some reason. I think 'doctor' is one of her top 15 dream jobs right now.$6
Entries.winter_18.001: Hey, do you need to see Harvey, too?
Entries.winter_18.002: So do you need to give her any shots today, Doc?
